start.text: You shouldn't have seen me. Now we have a problem.

choices.text: I'm on your side. Here's a token of my trust.
[Stealth] I move in the shadows, just like you.

neutral_response.text: Let's keep it that way. Forget you ever saw me.

hostile_response.text: Curiosity is a dangerous thing. I'm afraid I can't let you leave.

positive_response.text: Interesting. You might be useful. I'll be in touch.

stealth_success.text: I can see that. A fellow shadow. Be careful who you reveal yourself to.
